info.name: PandoraGym API Collection - Updated
info.description: Updated API collection based on new routing structure (no /auth or /api prefixes)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "password": "password123",
  "bornDate": "1990-01-01",
  "age": 33,
  "weight": 75.5,
  "objective": "Lose weight and gain muscle",
  "trainingFrequency": "3-4 times per week",

  "medicalCondition": "None",
  "physicalActivityLevel": "Beginner",
  "observations": "Looking to start a fitness journey"
}

{
  "name": "Jane Smith",
  "email": "jane@example.com",

  "description": "Certified personal trainer with 5 years experience",

}

item.name: Get Free Training Program by ID (GET /programs/free/{id})
